installedSkills.name: bdd-collaboration
installedSkills.description: Use when facilitating BDD collaboration between developers, testers, and business stakeholders. Use when running discovery workshops and example mapping sessions.

installedSkills.name: bdd-patterns
installedSkills.description: Use when applying Behavior-Driven Development patterns including Given-When-Then structure, feature files, and acceptance criteria. Use when writing BDD-style tests and specifications.

installedSkills.name: bdd-principles
installedSkills.description: Core BDD concepts, philosophy, and the Three Amigos practice
